code.value:
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageInput
from langflow.schema.message import Message
from langflow.template import Output


class MessageToStrComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Message to String"
    description = "Extracts the text from a Message object."
    name = "MessageToStr"
    icon = "arrow-right"

    inputs = [
        MessageInput(
            name="input_message",
            display_name="Input Message",
            info="The message to be passed forward.",
            required=True,
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Output String", name="output_str", method="to_str"),
    ]

    def to_str(self) -> Message:
        return self.input_message.text if self.input_message else ""
code.name: code
